creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: two kimono clad young women, holding kimono in PL hands, walk along a wooden bridge; river and hints of buildings in background
marks: Printed at left margin: [ 自摺  昭和二年作  京都三条大橋 ] LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LLC, in pencil: [Sanjo Bri
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: The Great Bridge of Sanjo_ in Kyoto
